name: Nav
description: Roll your own navigation style by extending the base .nav component.
note: To avoid confilcts with html5 <nav> tag, vueatrap uses <navigation> tag. Also by default, wrapping element is <ul>, so only <li>'s are required within <navigation> tag.

options.name: type
options.description: Type of the navigation. Use navbar type in conjuction with <navbar> element.
